R

RECYCLING_TYPES - Static variable in class model.entities.Trash
Contains all of the different types of recyclables
removeEntity(Entity) - Method in class model.Model
Removes an Entity from the Entities that will be processed during update().
removeListener(BoundsListener) - Method in class controller.bounds.Bounds
Remove a listener from the Bounds' list of listeners
removeListener(RequestListener) - Method in class controller.requests.RequestQueue
Have this queue stop informing listener when it fulfils requests
removeSprite(Sprite) - Method in class view.View
Removes a Sprite from the View
Request<R> - Class in controller.requests
A Request is a semantic type used to represent an action that SHOULD occur, but has not necessarily taken place yet
Request.RequestType - Enum in controller.requests
The possible types of actions that can be represented by a Request
RequestFactory - Class in controller.requests
RequestFactory is utility for producing different types of controller.requests
RequestFactory() - Constructor for class controller.requests.RequestFactory
 
RequestListener - Interface in controller.requests
RequestListener should be implemented by classes which wish to be notified by a RequestQueue when Requests are being fulfilled
RequestQueue - Class in controller.requests
A utility class for collecting Requests and distributing them to RequestListeners.
RequestQueue() - Constructor for class controller.requests.RequestQueue
Initialises an empty RequestQueue with no Requests or RequestListeners
reset(Entity.EntityType, Request.RequestType) - Method in class model.Model
Resets the model by clearing all components on the screen and resetting variables to their initial state and adds a TrashSpawner and Player.
resetModeExceptionTest() - Method in class ModelExceptionTests
 
restore(RequestQueue) - Method in class model.Model
Adds all Entities in the Model to the View, sets the correct score and pollution level, and sets the RequestQueue for all Entities and components of the Model.
retireModel() - Method in class model.Model
Removes all Entities from the Model and View, and removes self from the RequestListener.
